title: FirstWalletApp_Bounty
author: FirstWalletApp_Bounty
created_time: November 29, 2022, 04:10:05 PMLast edit: December 06, 2022, 09:06:43 AM by FirstWalletApp_Bounty
content: First Wallet App(Beta) Bounty Campaign •WEBSITE • TELEGRAM • TWITTER • FACEBOOK •   What is First Wallet App(Beta)?First Wallet App - Is the most reliable and secure crypto walletBuy, Store, Send, Trade and Earn cryptocurrency — all in just one application.BOUNTY DETAILS 1. 250 000 USDT are to be divided according to the stakes accumulated amongst selected participants.2. The bounty program was launched on November 29th, 2022 and will run until December 27th, 2023.3. The distribution will begin on 20th of February , 2023.BOUNTY GENERAL RULES1. All participants must Visit WEBSITE and join official Telegram Group,  Twitter Page and Facebook Page.2. Please note that any offensive or inappropriate behavior will lead to immediate disqualification from the campaign.3. Using multiple accounts, cheating and spamming are not allowed. You will be disqualified from the bounty program immediately and all your accounts will be banned permanently. Brand new accounts (<16 posts) are not allowed to join.4. Participants can not change their wallet address after registration. Please double check your wallet address before registration for any campaign.5. Negative Trusted Accounts may be allowed into this Campaign if the reason for red trust is libel or unjustifiable.Final Decision is at the Bounty manager's discretion if you have a massively red trusted account or acquire too many negatives during the campaign, you accept the risk that you might be eventually removed and your stakes voided.6. All participants must send the Proof of Authentication post to join the bounty program.7. All participants have to submit their weekly reports (for social campaigns) on this bounty thread. Stakes will be calculatedon a weekly basis. For each week, you are required to make new reports. Edited reports and POA will not be counted.Proof Of Registration Format (All participants must send 1 time):Code:#PROOF OF REGISTRATIONForum Username:Forum Profile Link:Telegram Username:Participated Campaigns:BSC Wallet Address:BOUNTY ALLOCATIONTwitter      30%Facebook       30%Video            40%Note:  Due to the bounty duration and pool, we have limited the number of participants for this bounty.Twitter:  First 2000 approved participants.Facebook: First 2000 approved participants.YouTube: First 1000 approved participants.BOUNTY SCHEDULEWeek 1 (29.11 - 05.12)►Week 2 (06.12 - 12.12)◄Week 3 (13.12 -19.12)Week 4 (20.12 - 27.12)SPREADSHEET--> If you have any problem regarding missing stakes, please write to the thread <--TWITTERRewards:1. 1000 - 9999 Followers - 1 stake2. 10000 - 19999 Followers - 2 stake3. 20000 - Followers - 3 stakeRules:1. Bounty participants  must join the telegram ico group : 2. You must follow our Twitter Profile: 3. You must have at least 1000 Followers to join this campaign.4. Minimum 5 Retweets and Likes per week.5. Minimum 2 tweets per week.6. Only 2 Tweet or Retweet per day.7. You must use this hash tag (#bounty #wallet #blockchain #cryptowallet #firstwalletapp) on your Tweet.8. You have to submit your weekly reports on this bounty thread. Stakes will be calculatedon a weekly basis. For each week, you are required to make new reports. Edited reports and POA will not be counted.How to join:1. Visit the Website and join official Twitter, Facebook and Telegram Group2. Fill the registration form: https://forms.gle/KncDXXyGht9driV47Code:Week #Twitter campaignTwitter url : Spreadsheet number: Retweets:1. 2. 3. 4. 5. Tweets:1. 2. FACEBOOKRewards:1. 1000 - 9999 Friends - 1 stake2. 10000 - 19999 Friends - 2 stake3. 20000 - Friends - 3 stakeRules:1. Bounty participants  must join the telegram ico group : 2. Every participant must follow the Facebook Page : 3. You must have at least 1000 friends to join this campaign.4. Minimum 5 shares per week.  6. Minimum 2 post per week. You must add (#bounty #wallet #blockchain #cryptowallet #firstwalletapp) on your Post.7. You have to submit your weekly reports (for social campaigns) on this bounty thread. Stakes will be calculatedon a weekly basis. For each week, you are required to make new reports. Edited reports and POA will not be counted.How to join:1. Visit the Website and join official Twitter, Facebook and Telegram Group2. Fill the registration form: https://forms.gle/h8Er4ifvELbgWGxbACode:Week #Facebook CampaignFacebook profile link: Spreadsheet number: Shares & like:1. 2. 3. 4. 5. Own posts:1. 2. YOUTUBERewards:High quality: 3 stakes (Good quality video and >5000 views )Good quality: 2 stake (Average quality video and >3000 views)Average quality: 1 stake (Average quality video and >1000 views)Rules:1. All Bounty participants  must join the telegram ico group : 2. You must have at least 2000 real subscribers on YouTube.3. The video may contain any constructive criticism about the project.4. The video must be at least 2 minutes long.5. Only original video content will be accepted. Copy from the project website, YouTube channels or from others' work will be rejected.6. Each participant can send only 1 video per week.7. The Youtube channel where you post the contents must be at least 1 month old.8. Videos should never be removed. Removal/deletion will result in disqualification9. All videos need to have a link to the Proof of Authentication, project's website,Facebook page, Twitter page, Telegram group, YouTube channel or any other social media.10. By joining this program, all participants accept that the project's team can use all these videos as marketing materialsHow to join:1. Visit the Website and join official Twitter, Facebook and Telegram Group2. Fill the registration form: https://forms.gle/du4J86KPpud8swXJ7
